Hero.Title: Hi, I'm Yogita Gami
Hero.Tagline: An Aspiring MERN Stack Developer with a passion for creating innovative web applications.
Hero.Introduction: I specialize in building full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. My journey in tech is fueled by curiosity and a desire to solve real-world problems through code.

About.Heading: I am a Master of Science graduate in Computer Science with Data Science, scoring an SGPA of 8.86 from Vikram University, Ujjain. Over the years, I have honed my skills in full-stack development, data visualization, and machine learning.

Skills_Summary.Libraries_and_Frameworks: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, Next.js, Django

GetMeAChai.Description: A Patreon-like platform built with the MERN stack and Next.js, enabling content creators to monetize their work.
GetMeAChai.Features: User authentication, creator dashboards, real-time updates.

Business Location Recommendation System.Description: A web application that assists entrepreneurs in identifying high-potential areas for business using clustering algorithms.

Contact.Describtion: I'd love to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team or project.
